document.full_text: an official said the truck was carrying fuses, detonators and a large amount of ammonium nitrate, a fertilizer that can be used to make improvised explosive devices.
document.title: explosives-laden truck seized in nigeria
lines_and_colors: an official said the truck was carrying fuses, detonators and a large amount of ammonium nitrate, a fertilizer that can be used to make improvised explosive devices.
